title.rendered: Lead Intelligence: Going From New Lead to Client ASAP

content.rendered:
Using Lead Insights to Build Relationships and Convert Leads Into Clients Faster

In this webinar recording, sales experts and real estate technology industry veterans Sheldon Rapoza and Jack Markham will teach you about lead intelligence tools and techniques that you can use to grow your business in 2018 and beyond.

With lead intelligence, any agent can become a top performer. It will help you capture as much information about your leads as possible to convert them into loyal clients faster—before your competitors get their business.

Get Lead Intelligence With the Market Leader Professional CRM

With the Market Leader Professional CRM, agents can get insight into which properties on their website their leads have viewed and saved. You can even get notified whenever a lead returns to your website! Request a free demo of Market Leader Professional today to learn more about all the powerful lead intelligence tools it contains.

Get a Demo
